sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const Games = () => { const gameProjects = [ { id: 1, title: "Cosmic Escape", status: "IN DEVELOPMENT", description: "A survival horror game set in the depths of space where players must navigate through abandoned space stations while avoiding cosmic entities.", features: ["Procedural Generation", "Atmospheric Horror", "Space Exploration"], fileName: "cosmic-escape", fileSize: "2.4 MB" }, { id: 2, title: "Void Runner", status: "PLANNING", description: "A fast-paced action game where players race through dimensional rifts, collecting cosmic energy while avoiding the void's corruption.", features: ["High-Speed Gameplay", "Dimensional Mechanics", "Energy Collection"], fileName: "void-runner", fileSize: "1.8 MB" }, { id: 3, title: "Nebula's Edge", status: "CONCEPT", description: "An exploration-based adventure game where players discover ancient alien civilizations and uncover the secrets of the Verse of the Sun.", features: ["Story-Driven", "Exploration", "Alien Civilizations"], fileName: "nebula-edge", fileSize: "3.1 MB" } ]; return (

Games Terminal

{gameProjects.length > 0 ? ( gameProjects.map((game, index) => (
/{game.fileName}.game {game.fileSize}
{game.title}
STATUS: {game.status} TYPE: ACTION
{game.description}
ACCESS_DEV
)) ) : (
/games.development 0.0 MB
GAMES IN PROGRESS
STATUS: DEVELOPMENT TYPE: IN PROGRESS
The Verse of the Sun gaming experiences are currently under development. Our team is crafting immersive interactive adventures that will bring the dark and thrilling universe to life through gameplay.
ACCESS_PENDING
)}
); }; export default Games;
